title: Options
description: The options that is contained inside the file `poku.json`

$schema.description: A field for the [JSON schema](https://json-schema.org/) specification

include.description:
Specify the path(s) to include in the configuration. Doesn't support glob patterns.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/poku/include-files

parallel.description:
Determines the mode of test execution.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/poku/options/parallel

filter.description:
Filter by path to match only the files that should be performed.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/poku/options/filter

exclude.description:
Exclude by path to match only the files that should be performed.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/poku/options/exclude

concurrency.description:
Limits the number of tests running concurrently.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/poku/options/concurrency

failFast.description:
Stops the tests at the first failure.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/poku/options/fail-fast

envFile.description:
Reads an environment file and sets the environment variables.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/helpers/env

kill.description:
Terminates the specified ports, port ranges and process IDs.
http://localhost:3000/docs/documentation/helpers/processes/kill

port.description:
Terminates the specified ports before running the test suite.
http://localhost:3000/docs/documentation/helpers/processes/kill#killport

range.description:
Terminates the specified port range before running the test suite.
http://localhost:3000/docs/documentation/helpers/processes/kill#killrange

pid.description:
Terminates the specified processes before running the test suite.
http://localhost:3000/docs/documentation/helpers/processes/kill#killpid

platform.description:
Determines the platform for test execution.
https://poku.io/docs/documentation/poku/options/platform
